page.title: 11WRENINGHAM FIRST SCHOOL
page.content: {This school is for 5-8yr. olds from {Wreningham,Ashwellthorpe & Fundenhall {- the children from Ash. & Fun. being {"bussed" to school.}3 teachers,1 being part-time,teach 57 children in 2 classrooms. There is{much parental {involvement in this happy school}with them helping daily,using the staffroom as another classroom & having craft & cookery sessions.Older children go swimming weekly & have recorder lessons.The school has good PE appara- tus & a local policeman gives weekly football training.Cooked dinners, brought from Wymondham cost 62p daily. {All children take part in harvest fes- {tivals & Xmas plays;these,along with {open days,tea parties & fairs are well {attended by local people.}The children also have summer & theatre outings. A large playing field & tarmac play-area give space for playtime fun & games.
